00020 // BUS_BASE_ADDR can be found and be set in the makefile, this can be used
00021 // if the current range (16 bits) is not enough.
00022

00044 unsigned int counter_compare0 = 0;
00046 unsigned int counter_sync = 0;
00048 unsigned int counter_ping_interval = 0;
00050 unsigned int rotator_status_counter = 0;
00052 unsigned int rotation_delay_counter;
00054 unsigned int rotation_break_delay_counter;
00055 
00056 //After the counter reaches half of it's limit we remove that number from it by
00057 //calling the function event_queue_wrap()
00058 unsigned int counter_event_timer = 0;
00059 
00060 unsigned char main_flags = 0;
00061 
00065 void bus_parse_message(void) {
00066         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message = rx_queue_get();
00067         unsigned char temp[5];
00068         
00069         switch(bus_message.cmd) {
00070                 case BUS_CMD_ACK:
00071                         bus_message_acked();
00072                         break;
00073                 case BUS_CMD_NACK:
00074                         bus_message_nacked();
00075                         break;
00076                 case BUS_CMD_PING:
00077                         break;
00078                 case BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_SET_ANGLE:
00079                         //1st byte = new direction (high bytes)
00080                         //2nd byte = new direction (low bytes)
00081                         
00082                         if (rotator_settings.rotator_mode == ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED)
00083                                 rotator_rotate_to((bus_message.data[0]<<8) + bus_message.data[1]);
00084                         
00085                         bus_send_ack(bus_message.from_addr);
00086                         break;
00087                 case BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_GET_ANGLE:
00088                         temp[0] = ((rotator_status.curr_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00089                         temp[1] = (rotator_status.curr_heading & 0xFF);
00090                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), bus_message.from_addr, (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_GET_ANGLE, 2, temp);
00091                         break;
00092                 case BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_GET_STATUS:
00093                         temp[0] = ((rotator_status.curr_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00094                         temp[1] = (rotator_status.curr_heading & 0xFF);
00095                         temp[2] = ((rotator_status.target_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00096                         temp[3] = (rotator_status.target_heading & 0xFF);
00097                         temp[4] = main_flags;
00098                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), bus_message.from_addr, (1<<BUS_MESSAGE_FLAGS_NEED_ACK), BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_GET_STATUS, 5, temp);
00099                         break;
00100                 case BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_ROTATE_CW:
00101                         if (rotator_settings.rotator_mode == ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED) {
00102                                 event_add_message(rotator_release_break,0,EVENT_QUEUE_RELEASE_BREAK_ID);
00103                                 event_add_message(rotator_rotate_cw,rotator_settings.rotation_break_delay,EVENT_QUEUE_ROTATE_CW_ID);
00104                         }
00105                         
00106                         bus_send_ack(bus_message.from_addr);
00107                         break;
00108                 case BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_ROTATE_CCW:
00109                         if (rotator_settings.rotator_mode == ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED) {
00110                                 event_add_message(rotator_release_break,0,EVENT_QUEUE_RELEASE_BREAK_ID);
00111                                 event_add_message(rotator_rotate_ccw,rotator_settings.rotation_break_delay,EVENT_QUEUE_ROTATE_CW_ID);
00112                         }
00113                         
00114                         bus_send_ack(bus_message.from_addr);
00115                         break;
00116                 case BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_STOP:
00117                         if (rotator_settings.rotator_mode == ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED) {
00118                                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_ROTATION_CW)) {
00119                                         rotator_stop_cw();
00120                                         event_add_message(rotator_activate_break,rotator_settings.rotation_break_delay,EVENT_QUEUE_ACTIVATE_BREAK_ID);
00121                                 }
00122                                 else if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_ROTATION_CCW)) {
00123                                         rotator_stop_ccw();
00124                                         event_add_message(rotator_activate_break,rotator_settings.rotation_break_delay,EVENT_QUEUE_ACTIVATE_BREAK_ID);
00125                                 }
00126                         }
00127 
00128                         bus_send_ack(bus_message.from_addr);
00129                         break;
00130                 case BUS_CMD_TRANSPARENT:
00131                         //TODO: Write this code
00132                         
00133                         bus_send_ack(bus_message.from_addr);
00134                         break;
00135                 default:
00136                         break;
00137         }
00138         
00139         //Drop the message
00140         rx_queue_drop();
00141 }
00142 
00148 void event_add_message(void (*func), unsigned int offset, unsigned char id) {
00149         EVENT_MESSAGE event;
00150         
00151         if (event_in_queue() == 0)
00152                 counter_event_timer = 0;
00153 
00154         event.func = func;
00155         event.time_target = counter_event_timer + offset;
00156         event.id = id;
00157         
00158         event_queue_add(event);
00159 }
00160 
00164 unsigned char read_ext_addr(void) {
00165         return(~(PINB >> 4) & 0x0F);
00166 }
00167 
00168 void init_dummy_values(void) {
00169         rotator_settings.heading_input = HEADING_INPUT_POT1;
00170         rotator_settings.rotator_mode = ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED;
00171         rotator_settings.cw_output = (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY1);
00172         rotator_settings.ccw_output = (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY2);
00173         rotator_settings.break_output = (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY3);
00174         rotator_settings.ad_conv_average = 10;  //Samples 10 times and takes an average of that
00175         rotator_settings.rotation_delay = 10;   //Rotation delay is 10 seconds before any action after a rotation
00176         rotator_settings.rotation_degree_max = 360;
00177         rotator_settings.rotation_start_angle = -90;
00178         rotator_settings.rotation_min = 100;
00179         rotator_settings.rotation_max = 900;
00180         rotator_settings.rotation_break_delay = 2;
00181         
00182         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_NO_ROTATION) | (1<<FLAG_ROTATION_ALLOWED);
00183 }
00184 
00187 void event_run(void) {
00188         if (event_in_queue()) {
00189                 EVENT_MESSAGE event = event_queue_get();
00190                 
00191                 //Run the function in the event queue
00192                 event.func();
00193         
00194                 //When the function has been run we drop the message
00195                 event_queue_drop();
00196         }
00197 }
00198 
00199 int main(void)
00200 {
00201         cli();
00202 
00203         delay_ms(100);
00204 
00205         a2dInit();
00206         a2dSetPrescaler(ADC_PRESCALE_DIV32);
00207         a2dSetReference(ADC_REFERENCE_AREF);
00208                 
00209         /* Read the external address of the device */
00210         bus_set_address(BUS_BASE_ADDR+read_ext_addr());
00211 
00212         /* This delay is simply so that if you have the devices connected to the same power supply
00213         all units should not send their status messages at the same time. Therefor we insert a delay
00214         that is based on the external address of the device */
00215         delay_ms(7 * bus_get_address());
00216 
00217         /* Initialize various hardware resources */
00218         init_ports();
00219 
00220         //Initialize the communication bus      
00221         bus_init();
00222         
00223         //The device should not be master, a rotator unit never is
00224         bus_set_is_master(0,0);
00225 
00226         //Timer used for the communication bus. The interrupt is caught in bus.c
00227         init_timer_2(); 
00228         
00229         //Timer with interrupts each ms
00230         init_timer_0(); 
00231         
00232         event_queue_init();
00233         
00234         sei();
00235         
00236         init_dummy_values();
00237         
00238         /*if (rotator_settings.rotator_mode == ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED) {
00239                 event_add_message(rotator_release_break,0,EVENT_QUEUE_RELEASE_BREAK_ID);
00240                 event_add_message(rotator_rotate_ccw,rotator_settings.rotation_break_delay*10,EVENT_QUEUE_ROTATE_CW_ID);
00241         }*/
00242         
00243         while(1) {      
00244                 if (!rx_queue_is_empty()) {
00245                         bus_parse_message();
00246                 }
00247 
00248                 if (!tx_queue_is_empty())
00249                         bus_check_tx_status();
00250                 
00251                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_RUN_EVENT_QUEUE)) {
00252                         //Run the event in the queue
00253                         event_run();
00254                         
00255                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_RUN_EVENT_QUEUE);
00256                 }
00257         }
00258         
00259         return (0);
00260 }
00261 
00263 ISR(SIG_OUTPUT_COMPARE0) {
00264         if (bus_allowed_to_send()) {
00265                 //Check if a ping message should be sent out on the bus
00266                 if (counter_ping_interval >= BUS_DEVICE_STATUS_MESSAGE_INTERVAL) {
00267                         unsigned char temp[6];
00268 
00269                         temp[0] = DEVICE_ID_ROTATOR_UNIT;
00270                         temp[1] = ((rotator_status.curr_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00271                         temp[2] = (rotator_status.curr_heading & 0xFF);
00272                         temp[3] = ((rotator_status.target_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00273                         temp[4] = (rotator_status.target_heading & 0xFF);
00274                         temp[5] = main_flags;
00275 
00276                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_PING, 6, temp);
00277 
00278                         counter_ping_interval = 0;
00279                 }
00280         }
00281         
00282         if (rotator_settings.heading_input == HEADING_INPUT_POT1)
00283                 rotator_status.curr_heading_ad_val = a2dConvert10bit(ADC_CH_ADC0);
00284         else if (rotator_settings.heading_input == HEADING_INPUT_POT2)
00285                 rotator_status.curr_heading_ad_val = a2dConvert10bit(ADC_CH_ADC1);
00286 
00287         //This limits the update interval of the rotator status when the rotator is turning to max
00288         //ROTATOR_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL in milliseconds, so if ROTATOR_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL is set
00289         //to 1000 it means that maximum update interval of beam heading is one second.
00290         //ROTATOR_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL can be found in main.h
00291         if (rotator_status_counter >= ROTATOR_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL) {
00292                 //We only update if the beaming heading has changed with > 1 degree from the last update
00293                 if (rotator_status.curr_heading != rotator_status.last_heading) {
00294                         unsigned char temp[6];
00295                         
00296                         temp[0] = DEVICE_ID_ROTATOR_UNIT;
00297                         temp[1] = ((rotator_status.curr_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00298                         temp[2] = (rotator_status.curr_heading & 0xFF);
00299                         temp[3] = ((rotator_status.target_heading >> 8) & 0xFF);
00300                         temp[4] = (rotator_status.target_heading & 0xFF);
00301                         temp[5] = main_flags;
00302         
00303                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_ROTATOR_GET_STATUS, 6, temp);
00304                         
00305                         rotator_status.last_heading = rotator_status.curr_heading;
00306                 }
00307                 
00308                 rotator_status_counter = 0;
00309         }
00310                 
00311         if (event_in_queue()) {
00312                 if (counter_event_timer >= (event_queue_get()).time_target)
00313                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_RUN_EVENT_QUEUE);
00314         }
00315         
00316         //If the value equals the half of it's range then
00317         //we remove that amount from all target times in the event
00318         //queue and set the counter to 0 again
00319         if (counter_event_timer >= 32767) {
00320                 event_queue_wrap(32767);
00321                 
00322                 counter_event_timer = 0;
00323         }
00324         
00325         if ((counter_compare0 % 100) == 0)
00326                 counter_event_timer++;
00327         
00328         rotation_delay_counter++;
00329         rotation_break_delay_counter++;
00330         rotator_status_counter++;
00331         counter_ping_interval++;
00332         counter_compare0++;
00333 }
00334 
00335 ISR(SIG_USART0_RECV) {
00336         //Read the character from the buffer
00337         unsigned char data = UDR0;
00338         
00339         if (rotator_settings.rotator_mode != ROTATOR_MODE_HARDWIRED) {
00340                 //TODO: Write RX code for rotators
00341                 
00342                 //Just to get rid of warning
00343                 data = data;
00344         }
00345 }

00347 ISR(SIG_USART0_DATA) {
00348         
00349 }
